def_en: A fringe is hair which is cut so that it hangs over your forehead.
A fringe is a decoration attached to clothes, or other objects such as curtains, consisting of a row of hanging strips or threads.
To be on the fringe or the fringes of a place means to be on the outside edge of it, or to be in one of the parts that are farthest from its centre.

def_cn: (某活动或机构的)次要部分，极端部分，外围
def_en: The fringe or the fringes of an activity or organization are its less important, least typical, or most extreme parts, rather than its main and central part.

def_cn: 次要的;非主流的;外围的
def_en: Fringe groups or events are less important or popular than other related groups or events.
